_header: A king sometime in country was
Subjects: Cross, feast of the Exaltation of
_description: Story of the Feast of the Exaltation of the Cross

BLHar4196.First Lines: A King sum tyme in cuntre wasþat had to name king chodroas…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat bare ihesu oure sawiowrevnto him be euer honowre
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In festo exaltacionis sancte crucis (rubric, f. 177rb)
